articles.author: Chico Harlan
articles.title: Pope Francis, visiting Greek razor wire-fenced migrant camp, challenges Europe to live up to its human rights ideals - The Washington Post
articles.description: The pontiff, who has long advocated for migrants, vented his frustration at the bloc’s treatment of asylum seekers.
articles.content:
Human lives, real people, are at stake! Francis said, in some of his most pleading words on a topic that has defined his pontificate.
